title: Educational Technology Integration Strategies for Vietnamese K-12 EFL Education: Designing a Blended Learning Model (Trichronous Model)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and experience in using simple digital tools
context.additional_context: An English education course linked to social studies subjects for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, conducted in classrooms equipped with digital devices (tablets, interactive whiteboards).

learning_goals: Learners can explain instructional design principles utilizing the three modes of the Trichronous Model (synchronous/asynchronous/self-directed learning) and propose actionable strategies for real-world educational settings.

Learners can select digital educational tools (Quizlet, Google Classroom, etc.) tailored to diverse learning styles (visual/auditory/kinesthetic) and develop integration strategies for EFL classrooms.

Learners can apply comprehensive analysis methods for evaluating ICT-based instruction effectiveness, including metrics for engagement, language proficiency improvement, and technological accessibility.

resources: Hybrid teaching tools such as OBS Studio/Zoom

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
